"
 Sensors Permission:
 - Access device sensors for health or fitness.
 - Sub-permissions: Heart rate, step count, activity sensors.
 - Use case: Health apps, step tracking, workout logging.
 - Risks: Sensitive health data can be collected and misused.
 "

"
 Vibration Permission:
 - Allows the app to trigger vibrations.
 - Use case: Notifications, haptic feedback.
 - Risks: Minimal risk, but excessive vibration can annoy users.
 "

"
 Other Permission:
 - Provides specific access required by the app.
 - Use case and risks depend on the exact permission.
 "

"
 Calendar Permission:
 - Access your calendar events.
 - Sub-permissions: Read existing events, add/edit/delete events.
 - Use case: Scheduling, reminders, event syncing.
 - Risks: Apps can see your appointments, track your schedule.
